statements.long: The common agricultural policy (CAP) should be readjusted from a compensation for cheap imports towards a green subsidy.
If you sugar rhubarb, it gets sour. Pollution has vitamins.
Germany should give bilateral help to Greece for border security and humanitarian relief.
Countries should enforce their national borders even in breach of EU agreements.
Violation of economic sanctions should be penalized by withholding EU subsidies
EU countries should not be subjected to a common regime of economic sanctiions.
Germany and France should revive their joint maneuvers.
All military operations should exclusively supervised by NATO. No role for the EU policy makers.
Import taxes and custom duties should be collected directly and retained by the EU.
The EU should be authorized to collect taxes. A surplus charge to national income taxes.
EU contributions by member states are too large. They are unfairly redistributed.
The EU should issue bonds. All member states should be liable.
The issuance of bonds, jointly underwritten by all EU member countries, would unleash growth, quickly amortizing.
The issuance of bonds, jointly underwritten by all EU member countries, would result in fiscal expansion.
Tranches of high, medium and low risk should be issued and auctioned separately.
Once an euro bond facility is established, the political economy of Europe will inevitably lead to excessive use of it. The price of money will fall. Supply of money will outstrip demand.
EU debt will be ruinous. It will destroy the currency. Making imports impossible. Impoverish wage earners. Benefitting asset owners. Decline and fall of Rome will ensue.
